alert.note: Alert for Albany; Converse; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 27 at 2:22PM MDT until May 27 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Albany County in southeastern Wyoming... West central Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... South central Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 222 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Laramie Peak, or 29 miles northwest of Wheatland, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Harris Park, Esterbrook and Esterbrook Campground. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
